monitoring-live-monitor.name: monitoring LiveMon for Node VI (ex-TA)
monitoring-live-monitor.properties: monitoringMonServer1=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17344 monitoringMonServer2=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17344 monitoringMonUser=monitoringlivemon monitoringMonUserPwd=monitoringlivemon monitoringAuditTopic=mag.vi.monitoring.audit monitoringServer1=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17322 monitoringServer2=ems1e.a1telekom.inside:17322 monitoringRequestQueue=mag.vi.monitoring.req Cores=vi monitoringInfraInstance=main monitoringInfraInstance=main monitoringQueueingInstance=mk monitoringAnalyticalInstance=main ProcessMonitor=enabled MonitoringNode=vi
